subject: Real Estate
title: The Battersea Power Station Curse
description: A quick win: understand The Battersea Power Station Curse.

hook.text: London's Battersea Power Station changed hands six times over 40 years. Every developer failed.

buildup.text: The iconic building was decommissioned in 1983. Its redevelopment became London's most notorious challenge.

discovery.text: Each new owner promised luxury apartments, shopping, and restaurants. Each ran out of money or ambition.

twist.text: A Malaysian consortium finally completed the project in 2022 after spending over Â£9 billion.

climax.text: Battersea proved that some properties are cursed not by location, but by the scale of ambition they demand.

punchline.text: Six owners failed before the seventh got it right.

quiz.question: How many owners tried and failed to redevelop Battersea Power Station?
